product_name: CycleOps Mag Bike Trainer with Shifter - 2014
long_description: Take your riding routine indoors during bad weather with the CycleOps Mag bike trainer. It uses a remote shifter so you can adjust resistance as you ride, letting you tailor your training on the fly.
short_description: Take your riding routine indoors during bad weather with the CycleOps Mag bike trainer. It uses a remote shifter so you can adjust resistance as you ride, letting you tailor your training on the fly.
